fields_of_interest: Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Environment
eu_initiatives:
Employment and social affairs: Occupational health & safety issues, social dialogue. 
REACH and chemical policies
organisation_name: European Association of Industrial Silica Producers (EUROSIL)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: EUROSIL is a member of IMA-Europe, the European Industrial Minerals Association.
goals__remit: EUROSIL is a comprehensive source of information for all issues relevant to the industrial silica industry, with the exception of issues that might affect the free competition amongst its members. The association provides its members with a forum in which to tackle regulatory, technical, health and safety and environmental issues and assures the representation of industrial silica at national and EU authority levels.
relevant_communication: See at www.ima-europe.eu, EUROSIL's umbrella association, Chapter Commitments.
